name: unique
summary: List unique values for a tag
description:
The unique command lists all unique values for a specified tag key. Useful for:

- Understanding data distribution
- Finding all highway types, amenities, etc.
- Data quality analysis
- Discovering tag value variations

Handles semicolon-separated values automatically.

options.--sort: Sort order: alpha, count, none (default: count)
options.--type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, json, csv (default: text)
options.--min-count: Only show values with at least N occurrences

output: List of unique values with optional counts and percentages. Shows coverage statistics (how many elements have this tag).
examples: osmfast unique city.osm --key amenity -f json -o amenities.json
